H0.text: Light can be used to eject electrons from a solid material under the right conditions.

H1.text: Force is the energy source that can be used to eject electrons from a solid material under the right conditions.

H2.text: Weight is the energy source that can be used to eject electrons from a solid material under the right conditions.

H3.text: Gravity can be used to eject electrons from a solid material under the right conditions.

A4.text: The photoelectric effect is the emission of electrons from a material caused by electromagnetic radiation such as ultraviolet light.
